TopicTitle: Who would win in a fight? Armored cores or gundams?

Articles.Content:
The title explains the gist of it, but here's what i mean in detail.

Who would win in a fight; Armored core: Verdict Day Level Armored cores, or Gundam AGE level gundams?

First, a Basic roster of the AC pilots that i can remember.

Reaper squad Member N, A super-skilled pilot that uses a High mobility lightweight Biped, uses advanced weaponry, but has defense issues.

Reaper squad member K

Pilots a Heavy Reverse joint (chicken legs) based AC that has awesome jumping capability, uses hard hitting sniper weaponry (including a burst fire sniper cannon)

Reaper squad member D

Pilots a super-heavy, epically armored Tank based AC, equips an Auto-cannon (think rapid fire shotgun) and a high ammo capacity artillery Gun.

Magnolia Curtis, A skilled but injured AC pilot, uses a Medium weight bipedal that has good mobility and average defenses, yet superb attack power (has a KARASAWA laser rifle, can kill most ACs' in 4 solid hits)

aaand Here's a basic roster of capabilities:

Armored cores;

Fairly high speed when weapons are disabled (scan mode)

Extremely ridiculous weapon power (able to take out tanks in a couple of shots, and the high end stuff includes tactical nuclear weapons)

awesome armor (are capable of withstanding massive amounts of punishment, including multiple H.E.A.T tank Rounds to the face)

is pretty much restricted to the ground, but can float on the surface of the water.

Massive variance (ranges from high speed lightweights who rely on kicking targets in the face, to small building sized tank-mech hybrids able to survive a glancing hit from a nuclear bomb)

Gundam:

High powered laser weaponry (Dods rifle is an example)

Fairly good armor

Massive speed

can operate in space

fair variance (can't easily switch parts, but there are many different models of mobile suits)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

So, who do YOU think would win in a fight?

Edited October 8, 2013 by Eyeshank2000
Moar changes.
cause I'm asian... no not really

What series of gundam?

If its Gundam Wing, then I think armored cores wouldnt be able to put up much of a fight. Some of the other gundam series would be much more evenly matched I would think.
Metal gear nukes all your basses. DONE
Metal gear nukes all your bases. DONE

Chuck Norris.

they won't even see it coming.

Im a huge AC fan. I haven't played 5 though. Not sure I like the changes they made from the older games.

A gundam wing mech ( I forget the name of hero's suit. ) against a human plus AC.. that'd be a hell of a battle.

AC 5 really isn't that bad, it's not the high-speed halo-esque ultra boolets death laser fest that 4-4FA was, but it does give a crap about smarts and tactics, like the older games in the series. designs are now also much more important. Verdict day however, does add a ton of new content everywehre (and a few new part types entirely) but at times it feels like a bit rushed, and kinda seems like it might have been an expansion pack at one point. Stilly pretty fun though, especially the bonus bosses!

ANYWAY, It seems like the AC's are winnin! hmm...NEW CHALLENGER!!

Orks

yes, ORKS

I recently went on a warhammer 40k spree, SO WE'RE ADDING ORKS
